body_html: There's something weird happening. You're building gloo, but still getting "Found Gloo: FALSE". However, libgloo.a is successfully linked into _C.so. On the other hand, MPI is found but not linked. You're likely getting some weird mix up with old build artifacts
body_text: There's something weird happening. You're building gloo, but still getting "Found Gloo: FALSE". However, libgloo.a is successfully linked into _C.so. On the other hand, MPI is found but not linked. You're likely getting some weird mix up with old build artifacts
body: There's something weird happening. You're building gloo, but still getting "Found Gloo: FALSE". However, `libgloo.a` is successfully linked into `_C.so`. On the other hand, MPI is found but not linked. You're likely getting some weird mix up with old build artifacts
